In this lab we will be introducing you to the *ergm* package in the *statnet*-suite of software. To use the tutorials and other material we will use a combination of [R](https://cran.r-project.org/), [RStudio](http://www.RStudio.com), and [Github](http://www.github.com).

## First Step Download R


* To start download [R](https://cran.r-project.org/)
* You will need to select your operating system version:
